title: Router: Service Baseline
description: Routes 'add baseline' and 'productionize' intents to the service baseline pack and optional productionize packs.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[Add baseline/productionize] --> Base[pack.service.baseline.v1]
  Base --> Obs[pack.feature.observability.v1]
  Base --> Res[pack.feature.resilience.v1]
  Base --> Health[pack.feature.health_checks.v1]
  Base --> Done[Done]
